name: RISE
description: this work is a continuation of my previous work, this work tells about Vrykolakas, he is the antagonist character in the story that I made, his rise is a sign of imminent bloodshed, the awakening of Vrykolakas during the red storm night which is a famous night of disaster, eyes who emitted a red glow in the darkness proved how evil and vile he was, with a haughty and calm nature he stared at the lightning as if it was prostrating to him upon his awakening, and suddenly he felt dizzy and bloodthirsty which made him even more uncontrollable, as he tried to control himself. himself he suddenly smelled a red and fragrant aroma like Ceylon Dimbula tea and at the same time he rushed to find the source of the aroma which at that moment made his throat even more dry.
